name: 3-shelf_Bookshelf
reviews: This bookshelf looks exactly like it does in the picture. We bought three of them and they were all excellent. They were very easy to put together. My husband and I added wood glue for extra stability as they are to be used in a preschool setting. I highly recommend this product!
Only thing I would like more is it it was able to hang on a wall.
Good quality, easy to assemble. Exactly what I wanted!
Great product. Fits perfectly in our playroom and looks exactly like the photo.
description: Organize a small book collection with this practical bookcase that features an adjustable shelf and two fixed ones. Use the generous storage space on the top ledge to display framed photos, figurines and decorative items. Place this bookshelf in your child's room to ensure easy access to his favorite books and toys.Crafted of natural-finish birch plywood and MDFIncludes one single-sided bookshelfMeasures 36"W x 12"D x 28"HComes with an anti-tip bracket for stabilityDesigned for indoor useStyleTraditionalMaterialWoodFinishNaturalAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorNeutralFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesIncludes HardwareStorage TypeBookcases and Shelves
